trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="<EncryptionProperty>" /> element used in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta l'elemento <see langword="<EncryptionProperty>" /> utilizzato nella crittografia XML.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> class encapsulates the `<EncryptionProperty>` element defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> classe incapsula il `<EncryptionProperty>` elemento definito dalla specifica World Wide Web Consortium di crittografia XML disponibile all'indirizzo http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> class to provide additional encryption information related to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> elements.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> classe per fornire altre informazioni sulla crittografia correlate per il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> elementi.

trans-unit.source: For example, use this class to specify a time stamp.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile utilizzare questa classe per specificare un timestamp.

trans-unit.source: The following code example encrypts and decrypts an XML document.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice riportato di seguito crittografa e decrittografa un documento XML.

trans-unit.source: This code example creates an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object that contains custom information about the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element, and adds the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection> collection of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice crea un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> oggetto contenente le informazioni personalizzate sul <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> elemento e aggiunge il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> dell'oggetto per il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection> insieme del <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> classe.

trans-unit.source: Finally, this code example displays information about the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Infine, vengono visualizzate informazioni sul <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> oggetto e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> class.

trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> utilizzando un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example encrypts and decrypts an XML document.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice riportato di seguito crittografa e decrittografa un documento XML.

trans-unit.source: This code example creates an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object that contains custom information about the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element, and adds the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection> collection of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice crea un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> oggetto contenente le informazioni personalizzate sul <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> elemento e aggiunge il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> dell'oggetto per il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection> insieme del <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> classe.

trans-unit.source: Finally, this code example displays information about the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Infine, vengono visualizzate informazioni sul <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> oggetto e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="elementProperty" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore del parametro <paramref name="elementProperty" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.LocalName" /> property of the <paramref name="elementProperty" /> parameter is not "EncryptionProperty".
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.LocalName" /> del parametro <paramref name="elementProperty" /> non è "EncryptionProperty".

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.NamespaceURI" /> property of the <paramref name="elementProperty" /> parameter is not "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#".
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.NamespaceURI" /> del parametro <paramref name="elementProperty" /> non è "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#".

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object that encapsulates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> che incapsula un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object that encapsulates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> che incapsula un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty.GetXml%2A> method returns a representation of the `<EncryptionProperty>` element.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty.GetXml%2A> il metodo restituisce una rappresentazione di `<EncryptionProperty>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'ID dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The ID of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> object.
trans-unit.target: ID dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The ID is used to reference the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object from another location.
trans-unit.target: L'ID viene utilizzato per fare riferimento il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> oggetto da un altro percorso.

trans-unit.source: The following code example encrypts and decrypts an XML document.

trans-unit.source: This code example creates an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object that contains custom information about the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element, and adds the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection> collection of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object to parse.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> da analizzare.

trans-unit.source: Parses the input <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> and configures the internal state of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> object to match.
trans-unit.target: Consente di analizzare <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> di input e di configurare lo stato interno dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty" /> di conseguenza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty.LoadXml%2A> method configures the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object to match the state of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty.LoadXml%2A> metodo consente di configurare il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> oggetto corrispondano allo stato di un <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore del parametro <paramref name="value" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.LocalName" /> property of the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is not "EncryptionProperty".
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.LocalName" /> del parametro <paramref name="value" /> non è "EncryptionProperty".

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlElement.NamespaceURI" /> del parametro <paramref name="value" /> non è "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#".
